result.markdown:
## CAPM and Cost of Equity for Aurora Technologies ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(202) #| eval: true #| results: asis #| echo: false #| warning: false library(webexercises) rf <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.03, sd = 0.005) beta <- rnorm(1, mean = 1.4, sd = 0.1) rm <- rnorm(1, mean = 0.09, sd = 0.01) ``` ::: Aurora Technologies’ equity beta is **1.36**. The risk-free rate is **2.43**% and the expected market return is **8.66**%. ::: {.question-block}
✅ According to CAPM: rₑ = r_f + β (r_m − r_f) = **10.88**%.
:::
